item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Hello i got a “pure shop” and i want only people with 99 str can trade she… is it possible?
and when they trade they loose 5mill gp.

and npc id is 535

and where i have to paste the code? in what file…
thanksfull for answers and srry for bad spelling

  • Meele[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2009, 07:52:21 am[/size][hr]Hello i think may this can work…

if(NPCID == 535){
if(playerLevel[1] < 99){
sM(“You need 99 Str to trade she.”);
}
else
if(playerLevel[1] >= 99 && HasItemAmount(995, 8000000){
NpcDialogue = 506;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
deleteItem(995, 8000000);
}
}

but where i add this?
